CHAT.comment: Saturday night at home on Spencer Street , continuation of side a? S and D speak together
Tape 17.3b; no .wav file recorded; sound file 1: 10:20 minutes

u.a: 8.5 sec: D puts S down , sniffs , silence
0.8 sec; 'ntuu' usually means 'down' so D is puzzled
voiceless , 8 sec: silence , 2 more knocks , silence
loud voiceless growl; 7 sec while S shrieks with laughter , D nuzzles him
overlapped by clatter drowning out first part of D's next utt
5 sec: S fusses for it , silence
5 sec: S fusses for it , silence
2 sec , S makes a soft sound
24 sec: silence , more bangs , more silence , D laughs
5.5 sec , D sniffs twice , clatter , S exhales
3.7 sec , D coughs , something drops , S blows twice
5.3 sec , D blows pitch pipe several times , silence , 2 air blows
3 sec: silence , then S does 2 air blows and D echos
starts clicking light switch as he speaks , continues clicking
buzzing as well as clicking; 1 sec
14 sec silence , sniffs , clicks , S air-blows; evidently trying to figure out how the pitchpipe works , D laughs
2.3 sec: D blows off then on the pitchpipe
rather growly; 0.6 sec , then they speak together
note this seems like a combination: 'door tikatika'
2.5 sec: silence , then D closes door
good natured , teasing , overlapped by S
26 sec: silence , clunk , burp , paper rustling , silence
very clearly , 23 sec silence , clatter , breathing , sniff
3.5 sec , silence , then S blows twice , echoed by D
12 sec; silence , S farts again , then D laughs
his word for his Mommy; 2.8 sec silence and 2 knocks
sounds a bit like 'who's there'; 0.5 sec
11 sec silence , rustles , crawling; S laughs at 1:07 and 1:08 , more silence
note this seems like a combination: 'door tikatika'; overlapped at end by D
4 sec silence and soft unintellibible sounds from S
puts S down; 9 sec no talk , rustles , clatter
3.1 sec , silence , sniff; D goes in other room
sounds far away; 5.7 sec silence , some clicks
ends on a very high pitch; 2 sec
5.4 sec silence , sniff , rustles , fridge door closes
12 sec silence , outside sounds , then D laughs
0.7 sec , evidently reaching for D's coffee
3.8 sec: D growls and nuzzles S who shrieks
7.7 sec: silence , then S coos happily three times; outside a horn honks twice; S crawls
7 sec: S breathes , then farts , then makes toots
11.5 sec rustling , crackle , rattle of plastic keys
thump; 0.8 sec; then they speak together
6 sec: silence , then horn honks outside
6 sec , loud car or motorcycle passes
overlapped by S vocalizing; 0.7 sec; then they speak together
overlapped by a protest sound from S; 0.7 sec

something drops loudly again; 14 sec , S playing
singing tone; 58 sec: more S playing; D sniffs occasionally
echoing S; 11.4 sec; S playing with clattery things , something falls
sounds like a gestalt of "n go down"; 0.7 sec
sounds like a gestalt of 'hafta si'down'; 0.6 sec
24 sec: silence , loud clatter , rattles of blocks; loud sound of garbage truck outside for 15 sec , someone shouts outside
softly; sounds like gestalt of 'wanna play' , 26 more sec clunking blocks , silence , breathing
4 sec: S blows once , then twice
0.7 sec silence , then they speak together
D starts to play guitar , 9 sec , S speaks over it
D continues playing guitar , 18 more sec
softly; 28 sec silence , rustles , car passes , loud cough
S starts to fuss as D continues to talk
S fusses for 3 sec; 1 sec silence , then more fuss
S fusses on and off for about 5 sec
overlapped by S making a small sound; 0.9 sec , then they speak together
